JUNE 14,1971 HARD ROCK CAFE LONDON Discover the place known for its authentic dining and world class entertainment when you visit the original cafe. Standing proudly on Londonâ€™s Old Park Lane since 1971, Hard Rock Cafe London is the founding cafe that started the legend that is Hard Rock. Walk in and be wowed by walls adorned with authentic, one-of-a-kind memorabilia from decades of rock history, including Hard Rockâ€™s very first piece of memorabilia â€“ the iconic red guitar given to Hard Rock Cafe London by Eric Clapton. Please note : Dogs are not permitted on our premises, with the exception ofÂ guide dogs and other assistance dogs. We do provide disabled access to our ground floor restaurant. The favourites on our world-famous menu include the Original Legendary BurgerÂ®, Moving MountainsÂ® Burger, One Night In Bangkok Spicy Shrimp, Apple Cobbler and various specialties such as our Chicken Sliders, Famous Fajitas, classic BBQ Pork Ribs and many more. Take a bite of music inspired tastes and quench your thirst with authentic cocktails including classics and new cocktails blended from the latest mixology trends. Experience the difference of Hard Rockâ€™s service with an energetic, hardworking staff, ready to provide you with everything you need to enjoy the perfect meal. View our Gender Pay Gap Statement 2025 View our Modern Slavery Statement CELEBRATING THE CULTURE OF HARD ROCK Celebrating 53 years as Londonâ€™s Ambassadors of Rock, Hard Rock Cafe London offers food, entertainment, and culture under one roof. Explore Londonâ€™s only rock nâ€™ roll museum when you visit The Vault, a treasure trove featuring the most treasured pieces of music memorabilia from across the globe. Tucked away in an old Coutts Bank, The Vault was once used to protect the Queenâ€™s coffers. Join us for a guided tour, free entry! The Back Room goes about its business of serving up world-class food, classy cocktails and great times in an intimateÂ rock â€™nâ€™ roll haven. We are looking for people who want to work in a fun, energetic and fast paced environment - do you think this could be you? Our History Peter Morton and Isaac Tigrett established the first Hard Rock Cafe in London in 1971. Today, Hard Rock International is one of the most globally recognized companies in the world and has venues in over 74 countries; Cafes, Casinos and Hotels. Hard Rock is also known for its collectible fashion and music-related merchandise, memorable dining experiences, Hard Rock Live performance venues and more. Building on its rich heritage of courageous and groundbreaking achievements, the Seminole Tribe of Florida acquired the Hard Rock brand in 2007 and is now poised to expand its horizon even further, to all corners of the globe LEARN MORE Living Our Mottos Hard Rock and the Seminole Tribe of Florida: the perfect marriage of two kindred spirits. Hard Rock's philosophy has always been based on strong values, including the importance of being authentic and independent and a shared service for preserving our wildlife and protecting our planet. LIVING OUR MOTTOS Social purpose is the life of Hard Rock, a company founded on the mottos â€“ Love All-Serve All, Take Time To Be Kind, Save The Planet, and All Is One. We work to improve lives, help communities and sustain the earth, infusing the power of music into all we do, wherever we are. Today, more than 40,000 Hard Rock employees enact our mottosâ€™ global values across 253 locations that include owned/licensed or managed Hotels, Casinos, Rock ShopsÂ®Â and Cafes spanning 68 countries. Employee Benefits Team Member Benefits: On boarding: An orientation day where you will learn about ourÂ history, our ownership and our culture. Working through OUR Mission, Mottos & Values. Working for a Global brand with 50+yrs of History â€“ We opened our 1stÂ Cafe in London, 1971! Training Opportunities: You will get specific department training, from a certified trainer, where you will learn knowledge and the skills needed for your role. Internal Food Hygiene and Health & Safety qualifications. All retail associates will complete our â€˜Rockinâ€™ Retailâ€™ training program, learning new skills, specifically for your department. If selected, you can participate in our Live* Learn * ROCK class, and YOU can become a certified Hard Rock trainer! Various Internal Development Programs, so you can continue learning. On line, e-learning classes, through our School of Hard Rock platform. Development and cross training in other departments. Possible development into all managerial positions, with a high % of internally promoted managers Recognition Programs: â€˜All is One Pinâ€™ Program. This is our internal program dedicated to help us celebrate YOUR anniversaries and achievements. â€˜Years of Serviceâ€™ program. This helps us celebrate YOUR milestone anniversaries with additional recognition and awards. Hard Rock Programs: Culture Club â€“ be part of our Philanthropic team doing GREAT local work in your community. Love All Serve All program - dedicated to help us look after guests who need additional support in hearing, speech, physical ability or autism. Other Benefits: Bounty program for finding fellow team members ( *Tâ€™s & Câ€™s apply ) We have a Global Footprint so there may be the opportunity to transfer and work in other units. Team Member and Family Room Rate Discount Program in some Hard Rock Hotels. Discount for Food & Beverage in Hard Rock properties. Opportunities to work on special Events/Live Music. Opportunities to work on Outside EventsÂ e.g. Music Festivals, Sporting Events If selected, the opportunity to help with new Cafe openingsÂ around the world!
